file_content.text: Stop... stop! I... where are we?
We should leave this place while we still can. Jomar's ship is in the aft hangar.
Leeha, it's me. You're going to be alright.
My poor droids... how did we get here?
You've been under the Emperor's control. You tortured Jomar and tried to kill me.
I can explain.
No. That's not possible. I... no....
It's been a long time since the Emperor defeated us. Concentrate. Try to remember.
Don't you remember anything?
I... no. I don't want to.
You and the Emperor set this trap. Why?
You tell me.
I can feel the Emperor's presence. I... he hates you. The things he made me do....
Come home to Tython. Master Satele will help you.
I have no right to ask you for anything, but... the Council doesn't need to know about us. Please keep our relationship to yourself.
Your relationship with Leeha nearly killed us all. You must tell the Council everything.
The truth must come out.
They won't understand, but I'd rather tell them myself than let you do it.
I don't agree with the Council's ban on Jedi falling in love.
You should be allowed to love.
Understatement of the millennium.
Really? I mean... interesting.
There's a war on. I don't care about your indiscretion.
It's none of my business.
It's not my job to expose your indiscretion.
It's none of my business.
Thank you. I... I'm sorry for all of this. I was wrong about you.
Not only are you a hypocrite, but now you're begging for favors.
My silence isn't free.
Considering all the trouble you've caused, the least you can do is offer a little compensation.
You're right. I have something back on Tython that I can send you.
My mission wasn't a total failure. I overheard Leeha delivering orders from the Emperor to a high-ranking Sith Lord.
I couldn't hear details, but I know someone named Lord Fulminiss went on a secret mission to the planet Voss.
Sounds like we'd better head for Voss and find out what Lord Full-of-himself is up to.
Just what we needed. Better tell Master Satele.
Lord Fulminiss. The Emperor isn't taking any chances with Voss.
We should head for Voss, too.
Sith Lord on Voss = important // Jedi + T7 = inform Master Satele
I'll take Leeha home. Thank you for saving her--us.
Right on time. You're practically a droid. I knew if I applied the right stimulus, you couldn't resist coming here.
Something's wrong with Leeha. She's not herself. She tricked me.
Jomar was chasing proof you'd fallen to the dark side. He fell into my trap like a greedy child. You were just as easy.
The Emperor is dominating your mind. Resist him.
You're being controlled.
I need information on the Emperor's plans. I'm guessing you can help.
Tell me about the Emperor.
I came to kill high-ranking Sith, but I'll settle for you. Back down while you still can.
Don't cross me.
Please, don't hurt her. She doesn't know what she's doing!
Poor boy. You think you love me--but what we shared in secret on Tython was only a shadow of true passion.
Wait... you and him? Now I've seen everything.
Jomar + Leeha = violation of Jedi Code
They obviously weren't doing it right.
They're a couple? Explains a lot.
They indulged their base desires. Impressive.
I'll show you true ecstasy, Jomar--but first things first.
I don't want to hurt you. If you care about Jomar, surrender.
Don't fight me, Leeha.
Surrender is for the weak. Jomar had that option. You don't.
This is why the Jedi are forbidden to fall in love. Your emotions have unbalanced you.
You've broken the Jedi Code.
Hypocrite. You think I can't sense your feelings for Kira?
You've been dead inside since you joined the order. You should thank me for what's coming.
Attack me and die. It's that simple.
This will end badly for you.
You remember the Meedees? I gave my little droid friends a few upgrades I think you'll enjoy. Briefly.
